experiences.description: Develop and maintain mobile applications in the healthcare and augmented reality (AR) domains using Flutter.
achievements: Built and maintained production Flutter applications across AI, healthcare, AR, and social domains, with third-party SDK integrations.
Implemented features, animations, and reusable UI components following Figma designs and product requirements.
Integrated REST APIs and third-party SDKs in collaboration with backend and design teams.
Improved app stability and performance through bug fixing and scalability enhancements.

experiences.description: Developed Flutter applications for multiple client projects based on Figma designs.
achievements: Built Flutter UI screens and reusable components from Figma designs.
Worked with REST APIs and basic state management using Provider and Riverpod.
Adhered to clean code principles and team Git workflows.
